snippet: DeMarcus Cousins had 34 points and 17 rebounds, Rudy Gay added 25 points, and the host Sacramento Kings handed the poor-shooting Los Angeles Clippers their first loss, 98-92, on Sunday.
abstract: Sacramento Kings defeat Los Angeles Clippers, 98-92; other NBA scores noted.
lead_paragraph: DeMarcus Cousins had 34 points and 17 rebounds, Rudy Gay added 25 points, and the host Sacramento Kings handed the poor-shooting Los Angeles Clippers their first loss, 98-92, on Sunday.

headline.main: Clippers Lose Their First; Heat Beat Raptors
headline.print_headline: Clippers Lose Their First; Heat Beat Raptors
